content: Hello! GitHub Pages is temporarily down for maintenance. Is there a mirror of the guide available somewhere?
Not that I am aware of but you can build a local site with the instructions on the README.
Thanks, i'll try that ineeded. I am a bit stupid to not have thought of that
No worries! The source is Markdown so you might even be able to get away with cloning the repository and reading those files if you just want the text content.
